taskTitle: Document HUD event mapping for Golden Loop phases and add tests

subtasks.description:
Implement: Document HUD event mapping for Golden Loop phases and add tests

Expand docs to show how orchestrator events map to HUD messages, including phase transitions, tool calls, and log streaming. Add a small test harness/fixture to assert HUD receives expected messages during a sample loop.
